statements: SELECT * FROM ImageTransformationMatrices;
SELECT id, matrix_1 FROM ImageTransformationMatrices;
SELECT matrix_2, matrix_4 FROM ImageTransformationMatrices;
SELECT * FROM ImageTransformationMatrices ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT matrix_1, matrix_3 FROM ImageTransformationMatrices WHERE matrix_1 > 0;
SELECT * FROM ImageTransformationMatrices WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, matrix_1 FROM ImageTransformationMatrices WHERE matrix_2 > 0 AND matrix_3 < 0;
SELECT * FROM ImageTransformationMatrices WHERE matrix_1 = 1 OR matrix_2 = 2 OR matrix_3 = 3;
SELECT id, matrix_1, matrix_3 FROM ImageTransformationMatrices WHERE matrix_2 BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.5 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ImageTransformationMatrices WHERE matrix_4 IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM ImageMatrices;
SELECT matrix_name, transformation_matrix FROM ImageMatrices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ImageTransformations WHERE transformation_type = 'Rotate';
SELECT id, matrix_name FROM ImageMatrices ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ImageTransformations WHERE image_id = 3 ORDER BY transformation_type ASC;
SELECT transformation_type, transformation_details FROM ImageTransformations WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT matrix_name FROM ImageMatrices WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY matrix_name DESC;
SELECT transformation_type, count(*) FROM ImageTransformations GROUP BY transformation_type;
SELECT * FROM ImageMatrices JOIN ImageTransformations ON ImageMatrices.id = ImageTransformations.image_id WHERE transformation_type = 'rotate';
SELECT matrix_name, transformation_type FROM ImageMatrices LEFT JOIN ImageTransformations ON ImageMatrices.id = ImageTransformations.image_id WHERE transformation_type = 'flip';
SELECT * FROM image_matrices;
SELECT id, matrix_name FROM image_matrices ORDER BY matrix_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, matrix_name FROM image_matrices WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, matrix_values->'rows' AS rows, matrix_values->'cols' AS cols FROM image_matrices;
SELECT * FROM image_warping WHERE warp_type = 'affine' AND warp_parameters->'angle' > 30;
SELECT * FROM image_matrices;
SELECT id, matrix_name, matrix_values FROM image_matrices WHERE image_id = '123';
SELECT * FROM image_warping ORDER BY warp_type ASC, id DESC;
SELECT id, warp_type, warp_parameters->>'scale' AS scale_value FROM image_warping WHERE image_id = '456';
SELECT id, image_id, correction_type, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(correction_values) AS num_values FROM perspective_correction WHERE correction_type = 'rotate'
SELECT * FROM ImageMatrices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT matrix_name, matrix_data FROM ImageMatrices WHERE matrix_name LIKE '%rotation%';
SELECT image_name, image_size FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_size > 1000 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT log_id, transformation_type, timestamp FROM TransformationLogs WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT correction_type, applied_at FROM CorrectionHistory WHERE image_id = 10 AND correction_type = 'brightness' ORDER BY applied_at DESC;
SELECT id, matrix_name FROM ImageMatrices ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_format FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_size > 1000 ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, transformation_type, timestamp, user_id FROM TransformationLogs WHERE transformation_type='resize' OR transformation_type='rotate' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT correction_id, image_id, correction_type, correction_data FROM CorrectionHistory WHERE correction_type='brightness' ORDER BY applied_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ImageMatrices INNER JOIN ImageMetadata ON ImageMatrices.id = ImageMetadata.image_id;
SELECT * FROM image_transformations;
SELECT id, image_id, transformation_matrix FROM image_warps ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT image_id, transformation_matrix FROM perspective_transformations WHERE image_id = 5;
SELECT image_name FROM image_metadata WHERE image_path LIKE '%/images%';
SELECT * FROM perspective_corrections LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM image_transformations WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT id, transformation_matrix FROM image_warps WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_id, COUNT(*) FROM perspective_transformations GROUP BY image_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM perspective_corrections WHERE correction_matrix LIKE '%scale%' AND image_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM image_metadata WHERE image_path LIKE '/uploads/%' ORDER BY image_name ASC;
